<title level="1" right="Rules">[Ledges](/Rules.aspx?ID=2810)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 94 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Ledges are narrow surfaces that overlook a lower area or provide the only means to move along the edge of a chasm. Moving across a narrow ledge requires using Acrobatics to Balance.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
